import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { withRouter } from "react-router"; import useAuthStore from "../stores/authStore"; import useProfileStore from "../stores/profileStore"; import { useQuery } from "react-query"; import { getProfileSection } from "../clients/onboarding"; const NewLoanRequest = (props: any) => { const [loanStatus, setLoanStatus] = useState(false); // const profile = useProfileStore((state) => state.profileSection); const token = useAuthStore((state) => state.accessToken); const { isLoading, error, data } = useQuery("data", () => getProfileSection(token) ); useEffect(() => { const loanValue = data && data.every((loan) => loan.completed === true); setLoanStatus(true); }); if (isLoading) { return
Loading...
; } return ( <>

New Loan


{loanStatus ? (

Learn more about the selected loan type

*5,000,000 maximum.

{/*

Please fill out this field.

*/}
) : ( <>

Oops! Looks like you need to complete your profile before we can disburse your money.

)}

); }; export default withRouter(NewLoanRequest);
